dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. V. Gool
C. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset is used for semantic image segmentation and contains 20 object categories and one background category, with a total of 1464 images in the training set, 1449 images in the validation set, and 1456 images in the test set.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012
